gear.name: spice grinder or mortar and pestle

cookingTips: Toast sesame seeds in dry skillet over medium heat for 2-3 minutes until fragrant, stirring constantly
Use fresh thyme for best flavor; dry thyme can be substituted but will be less aromatic
Store in airtight glass jar away from heat and light for up to 3 months
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I get the best flavor from za'atar, and what dishes pair well with it?
